name: Five Nights at Pac-man's
description:
Story:

one day you needed to pay your rent but you did not have the money to pay it so you got a job at Pac-man's Pizzeria! but the Pac-man's are still active at night and they are trying to get in your Office and eat you can you Servive Five nights or get eaten alive?

you can play this game on:

Window's

Mac

Chrome os
